roleset.name: not pledged, designated to
roleset.note: UNCOMMITTED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3. relation to commit.01. (from uncommitted.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: In two of the more recent polls , between 35 - 40 % of NH voters say they are either " likely to change their mind " or " undecided / uncommitted " .

example.name: args1, 2
example.text: Although at first he was uncommitted to the revolutionary goal, events in France would soon inspire him to take action.
